New Records: Jose Quintana's 25 ²/₃ scoreless innings streak was snapped
Key Match Events: Mets lost 6-0 to Brewers, Mets scored just 2 hits against 6 pitchers
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Carlos Mendoza emphasized the importance of winning and playing better
Post-Match Reflections: Pete Alonso attributed the loss to not playing their best baseball, Jose Quintana stated that nothing will be easy and they need to win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mets are now 0-5 against the Brewers this season, Mets can still clinch a wild-card berth if they beat the Brewers and Diamondbacks lose
Others: Atlanta moved one game ahead of the Mets for the NL wild-card spot, Mets own a tiebreaker with Arizona based on winning the season series
